supplyDemandQuery.title: primary energy consumption by region (avg fossil efficiency)
primary energy consumption by region (direct equivalent)
primary energy consumption with CCS by region (direct equivalent)
supplyDemandQuery.comments: WARNING: Results are slightly inflated due to improper secondary-output accounting

supplyDemandQuery.title: resource production by tech and vintage
regional primary energy prices
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type = 'sector' and (@name='regional oil' or @name='regional natural gas' or @name='regional coal' or @name='regional biomass' or @name='nuclearFuelGenIII')]/ cost/text()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec gen by gen tech
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' (:collapse:) and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='industrial energy use')]/ *[@type='subsector']/*[@type='technology' and not (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='output' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld')]/ physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec gen by gen tech and cooling tech
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' and not(@name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='output']/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec gen by gen tech and cooling tech and vintage
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' and not(@name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='output']/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec gen by gen tech and cooling tech (new)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' and not(@name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='output']/physical-output[ @vintage=parent::*/parent::*/@year]/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec energy input by subsector
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' (:collapse:) and not( @name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='input' and not( contains( @name, 'water')) and @name != 'oil-credits']/ demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec energy input by elec gen tech
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' and not(@name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='input' and not( contains( @name, 'water')) and @name != 'oil-credits']/ demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec energy input by elec gen tech and cooling tech
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' and not(@name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='input' and not( contains( @name, 'water')) and @name != 'oil-credits']/ demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec gen costs by cooling tech
elec td inputs and outputs
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='electricity_net_ownuse' or @name='elect_td_bld' or @name='elect_td_ind' or @name='elect_td_trn')]/ *[@type='subsector' (:collapse:)]/*[@type='technology' (:collapse:) and not (@name='rooftop_pv')]/ *[@type='output' (:collapse:)]/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: refined liquids production by tech (new)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='oil refining' or @name='biomass liquids' or @name='gas to liquids' or @name='coal to liquids')]/*[@type='subsector']/ *[@type='technology']/output-primary[@type='output' (:collapse:)]/physical-output[ @vintage=parent::*/parent::*/@year]/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: refinery inputs by tech (energy and feedstocks)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='oil refining' or @name='biomass liquids' or @name='gas to liquids' or @name='coal to liquids' or @name='regional oil' or @name='regional corn for ethanol' or @name='regional sugar for ethanol')]/ *[@type='subsector']/*[@type='technology']/ *[@type='input' and not(contains(@name,'water'))]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: refined liquids prices by sector
refined liquids costs by subsector
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='oil refining' or @name='biomass liquids' or @name='gas to liquids' or @name='coal to liquids')]/*[@type='subsector']/cost/text()

supplyDemandQuery.title: refined liquids costs by tech
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='oil refining' or @name='biomass liquids' or @name='gas to liquids' or @name='coal to liquids')]/*[@type='subsector']/*[@type='technology']/cost/text()

supplyDemandQuery.title: refining and oil share-weights by subsector
refining share-weights by tech
total final energy by aggregate sector
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and ((@name='building' or @name='industry' or @name='transportation') or (exists(child::keyword/@final-energy)))]//*[@type='input' (:collapse:) and not(@name='limestone' or @name='process heat cement' or @name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='renewable' or contains(@name, 'trn_') or @name='oil-credits')]/ demand-physical[@unit='EJ']/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: water withdrawals by state, sector, basin
water withdrawals by state, sector, basin (includes desal)
water consumption by state, sector, basin
water consumption by state, sector, basin (includes desal)
